title: Error
body: Every time i try to update my league of legends it give me a erro: unspecified error occurred please check the logs for more information. i havn't played league now for 4 days can someone please help me. i already tried to remove league and install it again didnt work....

replies.body: The error can be caused by a few factors, and depends on when it's happening exactly.  At what percent are you getting that error?  Happy to help, just let me know!
